title: Wayang shadow puppet
material_description: leather, ox horn, bamboo, oil paint
brief_description: Wayang Kulit shadow puppets depicting a range of 2D character forms made from animal skin, with an attached central pole and two slender side poles made from ox horn. Puppets are painted with oil and gold paint depicitng details of facial features, head-dresses, jewellery and clothing in a range of bright colours, skin of characters is depicted in gold.
